title: Ladies Lunch at the Park
description: During the summer months, let's enjoy the sunshine and fellowship at Lone Rock Park as well as devotion. Bring a sack lunch and a lawn chair.

title: GriefShare
description: GriefShare is a 13-week support series at the Bitterroot Valley Church of the Nazarene.

title: Youth Group Kickoff
description: Join us at the Eukers for a fun evening of games, food, and fellowship as we kick off the new youth group season.

title: Baby Shower for Natalie Krobatswch
description: A baby shower for Natalie Krobatswch in the fellowship hall. She is registered on Amazon, but diapers or other non-register gifts are perfectly fine as well. Light refreshments will be served.

title: MomLife
description: MomLife is starting up and will be held the second and fourth Tuesday morning of each month.

title: Youth Group Kick-off
description: All kids from 12 years through High School Graduation are invited to come to a BBQ and campfire at the Harrington's.

title: Wednesday Ladies Bible Study
description: Study in Genesis 12-50 taught by Jen Wilkinson. Contact Louisa Richardson to get on the list and your book ordered. You can join in without having done the previous book of chapters 1-16.

title: Ladies Afternoon Bible Study
description: Robin Howard will lead a 'Read and Discuss' study on the Gospel of Luke. This change will allow more of you to attend both the morning and afternoon studies if you so desire.
